definition: to indulge in fantasy (idiom); to let one's imagination run wild
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: For the next two days Carrie indulged in the most high-flown speculations .
sentences.chinese: 接下來的兩天，嘉莉沉浸在想入非非中。

sentences.english: After I heard these groundless talk , crackpot to her .
sentences.chinese: 我聽了這些風言風語後，對她想入非非。

sentences.english: My head was in the clouds, dreaming of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 我滿腦子都想入非非，整天想着哲學。

sentences.english: He often romanced over the oil painting of Mona Lisa.
sentences.chinese: 他常常對着油畫《蒙娜麗莎》想入非非。

sentences.english: She dreamt away the office hours.
sentences.chinese: 她在想入非非中混掉辦公時間。

sentences.english: They dream in courtship, but in wedlock wake.
sentences.chinese: 求婚時想入非非，結婚後如夢方醒。
他的想像脫離事實，想入非非。

sentences.english: You're fantasizing about a perfect woman.
sentences.chinese: 你對完美女人想入非非。

sentences.english: It's a great myth. It has a lot of elements that people love to fantasize about.
sentences.chinese: 這是個偉大的神話，包含了許多讓人想入非非的元素。

definition: to let one's imagination roam
lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.)/to have ants in one's pants/hyperactive/adventurous and uncontrollable
passing thought/an idea that comes into one's head/recollection
lit. spirit and soul upside down (idiom); infatuated and head over heels in love/fascinated/captivated
reverie/daydream/to be lost in wild and fanciful thoughts
burning with desire
to fantasize/sexual fantasy
to be infatuated with
enchanted/fascinated/charmed
lit. itchy heart/to be itching to do sth (idiom)
to stroke one's hair coquettishly (idiom)
alluring/erotic/romantic
bewitched/intoxicated by sth
one's thoughts fly to a longed-for place or person/to long for/infatuated/fascinated
ecstatic/enraptured
to attract/to titillate
